description: 搜索AI素养相关的学术文献

payload.context: 用户需要搜索AI素养相关的文献，包括理论基础、教育实践、评估框架等方面的最新研究

progress_reports.message: 开始执行AI素养相关学术文献搜索任务。正在分析查询关键词：'AI素养 AI Literacy'，搜索范围包括理论基础、教育实践、评估框架等方面的最新研究。
已向研究团队发送文献搜索请求，查询关键词：'AI素养 AI Literacy'，重点关注理论基础、教育实践、评估框架等方面。等待搜索结果返回。

result.notes: 搜索完成，找到4篇高度相关的AI素养学术文献，涵盖理论基础、评估框架和教育实践等多个维度。建议优先阅读Ng et al. (2023)的概念框架和Chen et al. (2022)的评估框架研究。

search_results.abstract: This paper proposes a comprehensive conceptual framework for AI literacy in educational contexts, integrating theoretical foundations from multiple disciplines.
search_results.title: AI Literacy: A Conceptual Framework for Understanding Artificial Intelligence in Education

search_results.abstract: Presents assessment frameworks for measuring AI literacy and discusses practical educational approaches for developing AI competencies.
search_results.title: Developing AI Literacy: Assessment Frameworks and Educational Practices

search_results.abstract: Examines the integration of AI literacy into K-12 curriculum, addressing pedagogical challenges and implementation strategies.
search_results.title: AI Literacy in K-12 Education: Challenges and Opportunities

search_results.abstract: Explores the theoretical underpinnings of AI literacy from cognitive science, computer science, and educational psychology perspectives.
search_results.title: Theoretical Foundations of AI Literacy: An Interdisciplinary Approach
